snippet.title: OmniBus gameplay: The whole of the bus goes round and round! (PC game demo)
snippet.description:
Silly physics game full of chaotic challenges for a bus that can't slow down in our OmniBus gameplay video! Subscribe for more games: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=randomiseuser

Download this game demo: http://buddycops.itch.io/omnibus?ac=jXdAbFQF

in OmniBus you are a bus whose accelerator is jammed on, and you're let loose in a variety of silly cities to cause as much carnage as possible.

OmniBus gameplay varies on the stage you're on - sometimes you need to get to a certain point, other times you're taking passengers on a sightseeing tour of London! And in the free roam mode you can pull off stunts to earn as much money as possible. No matter what, though, the only way to slow down is to smash your way through buildings. 

So you tumble and flip and fly through the air in OmniBus, but if you end up on your side, it's gameover!

In the current OmniBus gameplay demo there are five stages and a free roam mode. As the game is developed more buses and levels are promised - currently the three buses are a bendy bus, a Routemaster and an American-style city bus.

OmniBus is a Windows-only download from the link below, but the full game will be on Mac/Linux too.

OmniBus game version: Alpha Demo
Developed by: Buddy Cop Games
Formats available: PC / Windows
Free download: http://buddycops.itch.io/omnibus?ac=jXdAbFQF

Weird Indie is a Let's Play gameplay series about games that got off the bus at the wrong stop: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1fmiyuOquPzGzqUFasi7iy7x

Randomise User is the raw heart of gaming on YouTube. Subscribe to find out about early access games, experimental games, the best new indie and loads more!
Website: http://www.randomiseuser.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RandomiseUser

Thanks: http://www.alphabetagamer.com
